product_name: Rossignol Zymax Universal Cross-Country Skis - Juniors'
long_description: The Rossignol Zymax Universal skis are dual-discipline junior skis designed for both skate and classic skiing. A soft flex and grippy kick zone provide stable handling and easy kicking. Rossignol Zymax Universal skis have two base grooves that aid in tracking and add stability during skating for improved directional control. Wood cores with large air channels provide lightweight, durable performance; lacquered sidewall construction delivers balanced flex and longlasting durability. Stone finished bases optimize the glide phase.
short_description: The Rossignol Zymax Universal skis are dual-discipline junior skis designed for both skate and classic skiing. A soft flex and grippy kick zone provide stable handling and easy kicking.
